page.title: 17CLUBS AND SOCIETIES IN HAXEY
page.content: There are lots of different clubs and societies in Haxey.There is a football team who play on the playing field,normally every Saturday.There are two cricket teams who play on Sunday and Wednesday.There is a dominoes team and a darts team at the Duke William,who play teams from other pubs.There is a bowling team,who play on the bowling green at Haxey playing field.There is a table tennis club, also a team who play against other places.There is a tennis club who play each Tuesday on the courts at the playing field. There is a junior club held on a Tuesday at 6.30 to 7.30, then a youth club for the older children afterwards until 10.00. Every Monday the cubs are held down at the scout hut, also the scouts each Thursday.The guides are held at Haxey
